review.rating: As great a facility and staff you could ever wish for!
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n NhÃ¬n Ra ThÃ nh Phá»‘
review.comment_positive: I loved everything about my initial stay so much that I used Golden Sun as my home base during my month long travels. Everything is five stars.  Convenience, located centrally in Old Quarter (yet manages to be on a quieter lane), every staff member is friendly, professional, helpful, hard working and kind beyond belief.  The facilities are super clean, modern and well-maintained.  If that was not enough, they provide logistical and transit services, reasonably priced, timely and reliable, same for laundry service and last but not least, a superb free breakfast with fresh local fruit, juices, strong coffee and even an excellent Pho to start your day, with Western food options if preferred.  I highly recommend Golden Sun for solo travelers, couples, small groups or families. You will be treated like an old friend from the start.  Five VERY big stars.  Highly recommended!

review.comment_positive: Location is near the lake-about 5-10mins walk, it is really near. Big room and bathroom and we got a window as well. Clean enough. The floor is not carpeted. There is a lift access. Breakfast was good, variety of food. Front desk helped arranged for a cab for us to airport- i would say the price is reasonable. Hotel is responsive with messages via booking.com (i arrived late as the bus from Sapa reached quite late and was worried that the hotel will not let us in, so i alerted them that i will arrive by 12 midnight and they waited). Noise wise- yes its at a busy street but somehow we managed to sleep well- wasnt really noisy (we went during new years celebrbation)

review.comment_positive: I stayed at this hotel for 1 night before flying from Hanoi International Airport and I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The staff were super helpful, they helped me with my bags up to the room and out to the taxi. They booked a taxi for me to the airport (which was cheaper than Grab taxis) and also printed out some documents I needed for my flight. The room was clean and comfortable, everything I needed was provided! The staff were very polite, I have no complaints! I would recommend to stay here before either flying to the airport or just staying in Hanoi city centre! It is in a really good location/ close to everything youâ€™d need. Thank you for all your help, from a solo traveller :)

é£¯åº—è·é›¢è€åŸå€å•†åœˆè¿‘,ä½†åœ¨å¾Œå··è™•,æ·±å¤œéå¸¸æš—,è¦æ³¨æ„å®‰å…¨ã€‚å¥³å£«æœå‹™å“¡å¾ˆè¦ªåˆ‡å‹å–„
review.comment_negative:
When I checked in at 2:30 pm, the waiter (a man in charge) was very aggressive, had a bad tone, and didn't smile at all.
A polite and friendly lady at the counter, seeing that I had many family members waiting and a lot of luggage, told me that I could choose to pay right away or pay when I check out, but the male waiter suddenly rushed over, loud and rude, and said NO! NO! Pay now! Pay now! They will be busy tomorrow.
The friendly lady apologized to me, she felt embarrassed and I had to rush to check in.But the man in charge turned a blind eye and didn't even welcome my family to sit down and wait, so all  people stood in the lobby and waited for more than 15 minutes, including my old grandmother!
A very terrible check-in experience.When I checked out the next day, the counter was not busy at allï¼ there were no other passengers at all, and there was only one other passenger's luggage left.The male waiter who was in charge was really rude to the passengers. When I checked out, he suddenly became smiling and asked me many times to check in with him during the booking process. Give him five stars....
But the friendly lady and another male waiter (wearing glasses) helped open the door and pick up the luggage quickly. I am still very grateful for their help.
The triple room has adequate space, but the twin Room is very narrow (my brother is 183cm tall and needs to be very careful not to fall under the bed when he rolls over, but also to be careful not to hit the family members next to him)
The double bed Room facing the street was extremely noisy. When the refrigerator was running, the noise lasted for a long time, making it impossible to sleep. Even if the windows are closed, there are still grab bikers chatting and eating barbecue downstairs at 1 o'clock in the middle of the night, right under the room window.

review.comment_positive: Hotel is in ideal area for walking to many sites. 4 minute walk to the lake.  Not the fault of the hotel but it can be noisy due to other guests lack of courtesy. All room are off a center spiral staircase so sound traveled far. We were on the 3rd floor and could easily hear guests on 1st floor talking in reception area. Best part of the accommodation was the genuinely nice staff. Always rushed to get the door for us when they saw us coming or going and always pleasant. Wifi dropped out quiet frequently.  Not sure if it was just an issue during our stay or an ongoing issue. It wasnâ€™t imperative to us so I didnâ€™t mention it to staff.
review.comment_negative: The layout of the building made for poor acoustics so that sound traveled far.  Bring earplugs if youâ€™re a light sleeper. Hopefully you wonâ€™t encounter the rude guest having a 15 minute conversation in the hallway on speaker phone late in the evening like we did.

review.comment_positive:
Comfortable and quiet room. We were given a bigger room as we were travelling with a toddler and a baby and it was great as they had a bit more space to run around. Much appreciated! 
The owner and staff extremely helpful and attentive and spoke very good English. 
The breakfast was great! Lots of options and everything very tasty! I think previous reviews didnâ€™t rate it high and I have no idea why?! All the western options and also noodle soups were on the menu. 
Location very close to the lake and all the attractions. 
Great value for money and we highly recommend this hotel! 
Thanks for having us and for making us feel so welcome on our first days in Vietnam:)
Natalia and Jason

Suite Gia ÄÃ¬nh Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Located in the heart of the city, most places are walking distance. 
Nice rooms, good breakfast options - mix of western and Vietnamese. The staff are absolutely fabulous. Would like to call out an instance of great service.  One evening because of unseasonal rains the entrance to the hotel was blocked with rain water and there was no way to get in without getting shoes wet. My family and a few other guests belonging to the neighbouring hotel arrived there. The staff noticed this, the staff from the neighbouring hotel simply told their guests that the water will flow away in some time and they should wait. The staff at golden Sun went in and got some low plastic stools and placed them in the water, making it possible to enter the hotel without wetting our shoes/feet. Now that's what u call customer service.

review.rating: Great place to stay while in Ha Noi
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n
review.comment_positive: Very affordable pricing for a hotel near old quarter. For a three star hotel, the amenities and room met our standard, which was a safe and clean place to keep our belongings and sleep at night. We werenâ€™t looking for such an opulent or extravagant hotel. We stayed here twice during our trip- once before we went to sapa and again after we returned from sapa. All the staff were very nice and pleasant. They helped us book our tours and buses to where we needed to go. Gave us recommendations for food and advised us on how to get the best bang for our buck. Breakfast options were sufficient in my opinion. They even upgraded the room from a 1bed to 2bed room on our second stay with them. Given the price I paid and the service they provided, would definitely book with them again if I go to Ha Noi. Highly recommended.

review.rating: Great Location and Staff. A safe space in such a lively city like Hanoi.
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n
review.comment_positive:
The room was nice and the hotel was in great shape. The breakfast was good as well. But what made my stay in this Hotel so good was the personnel. I was struggling with food poisoning and they helped me to reschedule my bus transfer by one day without extra costs. Also, I could prolong my stay with them for another day without any problems. Even though they only serve breakfast I could ask them in the evening on WhatsApp whether they would still have some bread and bananas in the kitchen for me. They then even brought me the food to my room. :) To get better they also gave me a box of ginger tea which also helped a lot. 

Overall a very nice experience. I felt being in a safe space with nice people. Would definitely recommend and visit again. :)

review.rating: A PLEASANT STAY IN HANOI GOLDEN SUN HOTEL OLD QUARTER
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 6 nights from 13Feb to 19Feb 2023.
It is an old hotel (everything in Hanoi Old Quarter is old anyway) located 400m walking distance to the popular Hoan Kiem lake( Sat and Sun the surrounding roads at Hoan Kiem Lake are closed to vehicles). Restaurants, good street food places and a BRGmart are nearby the hotel location.

Our room was kept clean daily and we were happy with our room. The dedicated shower cabinet with a seating platform is much appreciated and also helps to keep the bathroom relatively dry.
Daily room keeping was up to our request. Thank you very much as my wife has sensitive skin condition.

Our room was at the front. So one could hear light traffic noises. The room window was doubled glazed.
For guests who want absolute quietness could choose rooms not facing the street.

We especially enjoyed the daily breakfast. This was the first time we stayed in a hotel with open breakfast kitchen. This is not common. Clean environment and freshly prepared foods. This has been daily highlight for our stay.
The 2 ladies really put their hearts in preparing the foods.
Our appreciation for their daily routine efforts. I deliberately took a picture to share.
We loved the freshly-cut fresh fruits and the freshly prepared bacons. We do not mind a little waiting at times when many guests came in at the same time.
We would return for their breakfast. Not usual to get freshly prepared for a variety of breakfast foods in hotels.
A small note. We like to observe people. The middle aged man was helping to clean the breakfast table( I think his official job was assigned at the lobby. He was helping out because the breakfast area could be busy when many guests come in at the same timing). He should sweep the bread crumbs on to a plate rather than sweeping partially to the floor. The young kitchen lady was doing it correctly.

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n NhÃ¬n Ra ThÃ nh Phá»‘
review.comment_positive: I literally LOVED every aspect of my stay at Golden Sun.  I stayed there on several occasions as a home base in my month-long travels in Vietnam.  Every aspect of the experience was above and beyond expectations.  Most notably the exceptional, personable, professional and caring staff of this hotel was memorable.  They are on top of every detail, from making sure your room is perfect, to the great, great breakfast offering (both Vietnamese and western cuisine), the bonus coverage of laundry service, arranging rides to and from the airport, travel and sightseeing options (which I didn't use, I already had a plan, but the opportunity was right there).  What stands out is the compassion and character of this hard-working and exceptionally friendly, top-shelf staff.  I cannot recommend the Golden Sun Hotel enough and if you want a place this is so well run, is conveniently located in the Old Quarter, solidly built, quiet and well appointed, then plan you stay around this establishment.  Five BIG stars.  Highly recommended.

review.comment_positive:
Fabulous hotel with beautiful staff.  The room isn't big but it's very clean and comfortable.  The first hotel we have been to in this price range that hasn't looked tired.  
It's in a great location for many of the iconic things to see such as train street.
They serve a very good breakfast.
Tom, Jenny and staff look after you so well.  They even let us store our luggage to tour to Ha Long Bay even though we were not going back to stay.
We booked tours to Ninh Binh and Ha Long Bay through them and the tours were also exceptional.  It really did take the guess work out of which one to choose.  It also meant we had a free pickup from the airport which was great!
Can't praise them enough.  Truly a pleasant stay.
Other thing to note is that we had an inner room and it was lovely and quiet.
Thank you!

review.comment_positive: We stayed at Golden Sun Hotel for 4 nights and returned for 1 night after a trip to Hoi An. We were thankful they let us leave some luggage behind to pick up on our return. The location is ideal - walking distance to Lake Hoan Kiem, night markets, restaurants and pubs including Ta hien. The rooms are clean and spacious with heaps of storage space and the beds are very comfortable. The Aircon, wifi and shower works perfectly. The showers are quite unique in that they have a separate glass cabinet for toiletries. The breakfast is good with a variety of western and vietnamese food with egg dishes made to order. The staff are just lovely and always welcoming. Tom the Manager is always looking out for guests to make sure they are ok. Hana the lovely receptionist is wonderful too. review.rating: Amazing service, fantastic location, great value.
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n
review.comment_positive: The staff at this hotel are so helpful and amazing. They messaged us via booking months ahead of time to let us know about tours they could book for us. We did the Ha Long Bay Tour through them and it was great! All of the staff speak good English and greeted us every time we came and left from the hotel. They gave us bottled water every morning even if we didnâ€™t have our room cleaned. The free breakfast is delicious at this hotel, you can get fruit, pho (veggie,chicken,or beef) toast, bacon, eggs, potatoes among other things. The location of this hotel is amazing, it is in the middle of the Old Quarter so you can pretty much walk 20 minutes to any of the major tourist spots. The staff will also give you a map of all the major things to see in the area. The room was very clean and spacious. When we checked out the staff arranged our airport taxi (for a fee) and packed us a breakfast we could take in the taxi since we left early. I canâ€™t recommend this hotel enough if you are coming to Hanoi.

review.rating: We would recommend this hotel to all travellers whole heartedly.
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n
review.comment_positive:
A property with unbeatable location, short walk to most attractions like the Hoan Kiem Lake and Train Street Eateries. The room was spacious and clean, modern with traditional vibes and had all the essentials including a fully stocked fridge and snacks.

The gentleman who checked us in, Martin I believe his name was, gave us a very warm welcome and assisted us in acquiring a moped to rent which we were providing in the morning. Nancy the Hotel Manager who we saw more of was extremely polite and courteous even allowing me to borrow her own personal rain coat while I drove to purchase my own.

Overall this was a remarkable stay and we are tempted to organise another trip to Vietnam solely to stay here again.

review.comment_positive: Very good breakfast, particularly for the price point. Friendly staff that are willing to assist you for any issue or request (night staff in particular). Good range of complimentary toiletries, that are refilled every day; and two water bottles as well.
review.comment_negative:
We didnâ€™t sleep in three nights. The first night there was a constant pumping noise in the wall (maybe the neighbouring building), we were kindly offered another room, but the noise was the same.
The second night, very noisy guests in the hallway, which resonates from reception through the staircase and every floor (rooms are definitely not soundproof).
The third, we went to bed with hammering and drilling, and woke up to the same (stopped after 9pm and started at 7am).
Most of all, the room was absolutely NOT what the photos show !
It was not cleaned properly, there was hair on the floor; the walls were filthy and needed a good paint job!!! There was a hole in the ceiling.

review.comment_positive:
Het personeel is heel aardig en bereidt je met van alles te helpen.
Op booking stond foute informatie over de kamer. De kamer zou uitzicht op de straat hebben. Dit bleek niet het geval te zijn. De meeste kamers hebben via de douche een raam. De informatie op booking zou aangepast worden .  Het misverstand werd keurig opgelost.met voordeel voor ons..De kamer is heel netjes en schoon en er is een prachtige badkamer met een douchecabine..
Het bed was erg groot  ,echt een kingsize.
Het ontbijt bestaat uit buffet en is erg uitgebreid.: warme gerechten, broodjes etc. Het is echt een goed ontbijt..
Het hotel is centraal gelegen in de oude wijk. Vlakbij het meer.

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n
Suite Gia ÄÃ¬nh Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Firstly, the staff at this hotel are exceptional - all of them from reception to kitchen to cleaners. Shout out to Linh, Luong, Hou, Thuy, Lien, Dat and others whose name I didn't manage to catch. Special thanks to Linh who made sure my husband had custard balls in the mornings and to Luong who liaise with the airline to make sure we got our luggage as they didn't make it onto the flight. It was such a relief to be able to leave it in Luong's hands.For the price point (mid range for Old Quarter) cutomer service was 5 stars, facilities everything you would expect it to be at this price point. We were in room 603 - big and spacious and right opposite the balcony which was perfect for chilling and enjoying the cocophanus sounds of the Old Quarter, especially since our room didn't have a view (although there was some natural light penetrating the room). Minimal noise as hotel is on a quieter street. Perfect location and service. Extended our stay here by 2 nights.
review.comment_negative: A small downside is not having a view from inside the room but the size and direct access to the balcony more than made up for it (just a quirk in the design). If a view is important to you then state this at the time of booking.I would suggest an upgrade on the big art pieces in the room as the grey is a bit dated. It's an easy way to add colour and inspiration as well as show casing Vietnam/Hanoi. Again, not a big deal.

review.comment_positive: The hotel is right within the old city and this conveniently located. At the same time it is in a quiet street that only has stores that close at night. We had a great room at the very top with two large double beds, perfectly suited for a family with to children. We paid c. 1.1m VND per night incl. breakfast. For the price the hotel is really great. The breakfast buffet was fairly large for the price of the hotel. The hotel was very helpful to arrange trips and even keep our luggage for another day when we were traveling back through Hanoi again. I would come back anytime again.

- Booked trips that comfortable and appropriately priced trips through the hotel and was happy with quality.

review.rating: Staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Room was great value for money!
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Gia ÄÃ¬nh Vá»›i SÃ¢n HiÃªn
review.comment_positive:
The room was super spacious and great value for money. We had such a cool view of the city of Hanoi and the general hustle and bustle of a proper local street that seemed to house tourists and locals alike. Great amenities, such as free drinking water (You learn to appreciate that gesture quickly in Vietnam). Bathroom was clean and functional. 

The staff were super helpful, including suggesting nearby places to explore while we waited for our room (we were early), as well as booking affordable transport for us from the airport as well as a shuttle bus that took us to our next location. Unbelievably helpful - they went above and beyond!
review.comment_negative: The only downside was that they couldn't accommodate our early arrival, but I consider that to be as much my responsibility as well as the hotel's. Their hands were tied by the time we got there considering they were fully booked, but I don't think I was explicitly told it wasn't possible until we arrived, at which point they said if I had preemptively booked two nights it would have been feasible - by which point it was too late. Ultimately though, a small blip considering when we got to our rooms it was absolutely worth the wait!

review.comment_positive: Rooms with bathroom are quite big and quite clean. Some rooms are to the backside with no windows, but also no problem. The staff is very, very friendly and helpful. Also trips, airport taxi, etc. can be booked. Nice and good buffet with coffee, tea, toast, butter, jam, fruits, bacon, etc. and additional food from the menu, e.g. pho or fried eggs. The hotel is located in the old quarter just a few minutes form Hoan Kiem Lake; so everything in the center is in walking distance. I have been there during my last Vietnam trip 2019 (before Corona). The hotel was and ist still very good and I can really recommend this hotel! :)

review.comment_positive:
The staff are super helpful. Shout out to Linh, she was very friendly and made us feel very welcomed. The staff had organised our tour of Ninh Binh + hotel drop off and pick up seamlessly. They even held our suitcase for the 2 nights we were away in Ha Long Bay. 
The Hotel situated on a more quieter street and  is less than 5 mins was from the busy shopping street. This was definitely moneys worth and you get a great staff to help you out if your totally new to Vietnam. 
Overall the room was clean and easy access with elevator.  Breakfast was descent but the coffee was very good.

packed breakfast for us.

review.rating: We enjoyed our stay at the Golden Sun Hotel and would recommend this hotel !!!
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng GiÆ°á»ng ÄÃ´i/2 GiÆ°á»ng ÄÆ¡n NhÃ¬n Ra ThÃ nh Phá»‘
review.comment_positive: Very good hotel located right in the middle of Ha Noi, Old Town.  Close proximity to everything, many restaurants close by; only 5 minutes walk to the lake. Excellent staff; everyone was so friendly and very helpful.  Very good breakfast with freshly made to order food: pho, omelet, eggs...  The beds were big and comfortable. Even though the hotel is located on a busy street with a school across the street, you could barely hear the noises when you are in the room.  Good shower with strong pressure and hot water.  Management were very helpful and they helped to book transportation for us to get to the airport.  On our last day, we were able to leave our luggage at the hotel (after we checked out) and explored the town for a few hours before we went to the airport.
review.comment_negative:
We stayed in 2 rooms: Deluxe Family Suite (5th floor) and Double Room with City View (2nd floor).  The wi-fi internet on the 5th floor was good; but the wi-fi internet on the 2nd floor was slow and inconsistent.  Hotel staff were very helpful; but there weren't much they could do improve the wi-fi internet on 2nd floor.  

With 4 people stayed in the Deluxe Family Suite, it would be nice if there is a bigger table in the room.
